quotes.quote: Matt... I never thought you'd be killed... I'm sorry.
There is no heaven or hell. No matter what you do while you're alive, everybody goes to the same place once you die. Death is Equal.
Making such a sleazebag a spokesman...
For me and Mello, L has been the only person we adore, and the only person who deserves our respect.
If I sit like a normal person my investigative abilities are only working at 50% efficiency.
I don't care if it is fortunate or unfortunate that Light picked up the Death Note. However... It is generally bad luck for a person to be followed by a God of Death.
Risking your life and doing something that could easily rob you of your life are exact opposites.
This world is still rotten!.. With too many rotten people.

I understood that killing people was a crime. There was no other way! The world had to be fixed! A purpose given to me! Only I could do it. Who else could have done it, and come this far? Would they have kept going? The only one who can create a new world is me.
*after touching Misa's butt and getting away with it* This is an outrage... taking advantage of this situation! I assure you, I will get to the bottom of this!
But you know the saying, "play with fire, and you'll get burned". I'll make you regret underestimating L...underestimating me.
It's time I started living my own life.
To Mello, it's like playing a videogame against me, I think. "See who gets to Kira, the last boss, first."

This world is rotten and those who are making it rot deserve to die. Someone has to do it, so why not me? Even if it means sacrificing my own mind and soul, it's worth it. Because the world... can't go on like this. I wonder... what if someone else had picked up this notebook? Is there anyone out there other than me who'd be willing to eliminate the vermin from the world? If I don't do it, then who will? That's just it: there's no one, but I can do it. In fact, I'm the only one who can. I'll do it. Using the death note, I'll change the world.
I am the God placed here to save the weak and create a perfect world.
All humans die the same, the place they go after death isn't decided upon by a god it is Mu (nothingness).
I am Justice! I protect the innocent and those who fear evil. I'm the one that will become the god of a new world that every one desires!
I am a complete opposite of Ryuk.
If you keep my secret, this strawberry is yours.
*to Near* Which of us will get Kira first... it's a race!
I've never considered finding that notebook and gaining that power a misfortune.
It was the only way the world had to be fixed! A purpose, given to me!
That was worth an academy award, Light.
Then let me ask you, do gods of death love apples?

In this world, there is only good and evil, that was the first universal truths I grasped from observing the world around me when I was a child. Every human being without exception ends up falling into one category or the other.
It's my turn to use you.
You said she's smart, but it only means she got high marks, and she's actually a stupid woman.
As a rule, they say humans haunted by a shinigami have nothing but misfortune.
Let's show him...that the good guys always win.
The bells are very loud today.
I am Light's girlfriend from university.
No matter what the world, the god of that world creates the rules. In truth, you have been defeated by the rules I created. And as punishment for defying the God of the new world, you will die...
You let them take it from right under your nose.
He was someone who deserved to die.
I'm not just a tool for you to use in order to solve your puzzles, you know!
This isn't divine jugdement. It's the work of some childish killer who's playing at divine retribution. That's all.
I can't develop feelings. That's how most idiots screw up.
Actually, if you're smart, you can eat sweets without gaining weight.
I haven't said anything about letting them commit murder...yet.

Oh, I almost forgot. In the event that anyone besides big-headed Near or the deluded murderer is reading these notes, then I should at least perform the basic courtesy of introducing myself, here at the end of the prologue. I am your narrator, your navigator, your storyteller. For anyone else but those two, my identity may be of no interest, but I am the old world's runner-up, the best dresser that died like a dog, Mihael Keehl. I once called myself Mello and was addressed by that name, but that was a long time ago.

It's not a sense of justice. Figuring out difficult cases is my hobby. If you measured good and evil deeds by current laws, I would be responsible for many crimes. The same way you all like to solve mysteries and riddles, or clear video games more quickly. For me too, it's simply prolonging something I enjoy doing. That's why I only take on cases that pique my interest. It's not justice at all. And if it means being able to clear a case, I don't play fair, I'm a dishonest, cheating human being who hates losing.
Seriously, enslavement is funny...
Kira is childish and he hates losing... I'm also childish and hate to lose. That's how I know.
The real evil is the power to kill people. Someone who finds himself with that power is cursed. No matter how you use it, anything obtained by killing people can never bring true happiness.

Careful what you do, cuz "God" is watching your every move. Hold my hand in the dark street, for if you do I know that I'll.. be safe. Even if I'm far away and alone, I can be sure that you'll find me there, this I know. You told me close for a while, so quite. You tell me everything. If I forget what to say then you'll come to me and tell me again, yes you'd tell me once again. But what happens when I know it all and what should I do, after that, what then?
What do you mean I use my sexual charm?!
*after Misa-chan says that she can't imagine a world without Light* Hmmm... Yes, it would be dark!
You, who've taken on his name, have managed – well, nothing.

I didn’t choose you. Don’t you see this is all just an accident. You actually thought you were chosen because you’re so smart or something? Don’t be so vain. It just happened to fall around here and you just happen to pick it up, and that’s all there is to it.
Hey, all it did was go around in a full circle.
Why are you staring at me? Are you annoyed that I am the only one who has cake?
The thing I hate the most is to trample on other people's good will.

That may be so. What is right from wrong? What is good from evil? Nobody can truly distinguish between them. Even if there was a god. Now, supposing a god and his world existed, even then I'd stop and think for myself. I'd decide for myself whether his teachings are right or wrong. After all, I am just the same as you. I put faith in my own convictions as to what I believe is right, and consider them to be righteous.

Under normal circumstances, humans should have continued to evolve as the greatest creatures upon this earth, but we were actually regressing. A rotten world. Politics, law, education... Was there anybody around who could correct this world? But someone had to do it.
I have two rules: First, I'm never wrong. Second, if I'm wrong... back to the first rule.

There are... many types of monsters in this world: Monsters who will not show themselves and who cause trouble; monsters who abduct children; monsters who devour dreams; monsters who suck blood, and... monsters who always tell lies. Lying monsters are a real nuisance. They are much more cunning than other monsters. They pose as humans even though they have no understanding of the human heart. They eat even though they've never experienced hunger. They study even though they have no interest in academics. They seek friendship even though they do not know how to love. If I were to encounter such a monster, I would likely be eaten by it. Because in truth, I am that monster.
Laws aren't perfect, because humans who created laws aren't perfect. It's impossible to be perfect. However, the laws are evidence of the human's struggle to be righteous.
I have a mind of a genius and a strong sense of justice.
It's not whether it's feasible or not – it's what I'm doing.
I stole a death note.
Being alone is better than being with the wrong person.
Near and the others told me that this woman was supposed to be the second Kira. But could it really be this unbelievably stupid girl?..
Learn to treasure your life because unfortunately, it can be taken away from you anytime.
Sometimes, the questions are complicated - and the answers are simple.
Does she understand what she's doing, this stupid woman?
I don't know what to say. Now, I think it's just best to observe closely.
I can’t even imagine a world without Light.
Let's value our lives.
Humans aren't made perfectly. Everyone lies. Even so... I've been careful not to tell lies that hurt others.
I'm pleased to meet you at last, L Number Two.
L, do you know gods of death love apples?
In this world, there are very few people who actually trust each other.
I've wanted to make him taste his own pathetic failure with all my heart.
Things are getting interesting now.
Look around you, and all you will see are people the world would be better off without.
You can't ever win if you're always on the defensive. To win, you have to attack!
I don't sit like this because I want to. I have to sit like this. If I were to sit normally, my deductive skills will immediately be reduced by roughly 40%.
Our battle will be concluded, and I will begin my reign from the summit of victory!
For murderers, there is no good or evil. I know that.
And that's precisely why it's so convenient, don't you think?
Apples taste so much better indoors.
In the end, L is indeed the greatest detective on earth...
In the end, there is no greater motivation than revenge.
Kira is a god.
So, how about you tell me right now whom you'd like me to kill, and how. I'll treat'cha to it.
I am a famous model.
I love chocolates.
He's terribly reasonable, this new L.
This is the first time in my life that I've been provoked to hit a woman.
If you use your head, you won't get fat even if you eat sweets.
People in supervising positions in investigation are supposed to give too much of their opinion, and if they are wrong, all it would take is an apology.
I must protect my fledging Utopia.
That's right, I am Kira. And what can you do? Kill me right here?
I feel like I'm watching a sitcom.
No matter how gifted you are... You, alone, cannot change the world.

Only I could do it! I was well aware that killing people is crime in itself! Yet at that point it was the only way to make things right! I thought to myself that someday people will come to realize this as much, and regard it as an act of justice! I had no choice but to act as Kira… it was the destiny given to me. I was chosen to renew this rotten world, to bring about true peace – a utopia.
For me, apples are like cigarettes and liquor for humans. If I'm deprived, I go into withdrawals.
The human world is a boring place with boring people doing boring things.
I've won. Exactly as planned.
Humans are so... interesting.
Unless someone makes the first move, nothing will happen.
Sorry, but...believe it or not, I'm a male too.
I'll solve equations with my right hand and write names with my left. I'll take a potato chip... and eat it!
Ah! She smirked at me! Misa is going to break her legs!
Light-kun, please get Misa to shut up.
He, who attacks first, always wins.
Well, it was good while it lasted. We killed some boredom, didn't we? We did some various and interesting things.

You have lost, Light. Didn't I say in the beginning, when you die, the one who'll write your name down in a notebook will be me? That is the deal between the Shinigami and the first human to get their hands on the note in the human world. Once you enter prison, I don't know when you'll die. It's annoying to wait. Your life is already over. You'll die here.
Ahh! NO way! Someone just touched my butt!
Light-kun is my only friend.
I'm a...pervert?
If you don't get serious about this...I'll kick you.
I give you the strawberry if you keep it a secret.
I came to exterminate the vermin of this world!
Watashi wa L-desu.
I will reign over a new world.
If you can't beat the game, if you can't solve the puzzle, you're nothing but a loser.
I'll kill anyone who gets in my way. I'll be the number one.
Will you be eating that cake?...say what you want, but I will be taking the cake.
I am the god of the new world!
